ygData.subject: Re: Having troubles...
ygData.msgSnippet: I can definately sympathize with your plight, my brother.  I too have troubles finding a good area to fight in at this lvl. But what I do is now is fight in
ygData.messageBody:
I can definately sympathize with your plight, my
brother. I too have troubles finding a good area to
fight in at this lvl. But what I do is now is fight in
Highhold. Usually there are enough groups around to
take care of possible trains, and soloing is not too
difficult. The loot is good as in Lavastorm.
- If you are willing to Travel farther into oasis
there are usually less people at the 2nd pillar.

Xraxex
Warrior of the 17th Order
Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal

--- Tom Swift wrote:
> I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting
> right now.
>
> I have reached level 15, I am almost 16. I have
> maxed both dual wield and double attack at 80 each.
> I seem to be having trouble effectively hunting.
> Anything that cons white to me is always a tough
> fight that can go either way, so I usually end up
> sticking to blue critters. However some blue
> critters are just to tough to solo. Lava basilisks
> are a no-no because of Stone Breath, fire elementals
> have some kind of damage shield which causes me
> damage each time I hit so they are a no-no also.
> Lavastorm being my preferred hunting area right now.
> I tried crocs in Oasis, but it is to crowded when I
> play (8pm-10pm) for me to even find anything to
> kill.
>
> I guess I am at that awkward level and was looking
> for advice from other warriors on how they got fro
> 15 to 16.
>
> Bael
> Warrior of the 15th Order
> Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal
>
